ISSUE.TITLE: Allow to add custom URLs to sitemap.xml file
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It would be nice if we could add a list of URL's through the admin section that would get injected in the sitemap.xml. This is useful for some SEO URL's created by some plugins, or only specifying certain product URL's not all (I'm sure other reasons which have not come to mind). Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/45090/feature-request-sitemapxml-add-specific-urls.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #1935 Fixed Autofac warnings. 'ContainerBuilder.Update(IContainer)' method is obsolete

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1882 Allow a store owner to add custom URLs to sitemap.xml file in admin area (use "commonsettings.sitemapcustomurls" setting).
